column1: The title Wisewoman was applied to women of the Edain in the First Age who had great knowledge of the history and lore of their people. Some married
column2: while others remained unwed. All of them passed their knowledge on to a chosen successor
column3: as was usual among the Wise of the Edain.

column1: Two Wisewomen are known by name: Adanel and Andreth.
